alert.note: Alert for Garland; Montgomery; Perry; Saline; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:39PM CDT until June 25 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Perry County in central Arkansas... Garland County in central Arkansas... Western Saline County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Yell County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 738 PM CDT, scattered strong to severe thunderstorms were located from Fourche Valley to 9 miles northeast of Jessieville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Benton... Hot Springs Village... Haskell... Mountain Pine... Lonsdale... Fourche Valley... Jessieville... Lake Ouachita State Park... Hot Springs National Park... Avant... Wing... Mt Tabor... Fannie... Bluffton... Shaw... Royal... Lena Landing Rec Area... Rover... Gulpha Gorge... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
